record.field: To clear the payment "%(payment)s" you must configure a replacement account for "%(account)s".
To clear the payment "%(payment)s" you must configure a replacement account for "%(account)s" or an active account on the payment journal "%(journal)s".
To clear the payment "%(payment)s" you must configure a payable account for party "%(party)s".
To clear the payment "%(payment)s" you must configure a receivable account for party "%(party)s".
